issue.title: [Rust] DF Implement GROUP BY support for Float32/Float64
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11221](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11221). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There is a problem with Floats, Rust doesn't provides Hash, Eq for floats inside std library

comments.body:
